languages.text: {n}Прежде чем ответить сын губернатора нервно поправляет свой дорогой сюртук.{/n} "Думаю... Достаточное количество денег способно открыть путь куда угодно".

traits.locale_text: {n}Прежде, чем ответить сын губернатора нервно поправляет свой дорогой сюртук.{/n} "Думаю... Достаточное количество тронгельтов способно открыть путь куда угодно".

languages.text: {n}Before replying, the governor's son nervously adjusts his expensive frock coat.{/n} "I think... the right amount of money can open any door."
languages.original_text: {n}Прежде чем ответить сын губернатора нервно поправляет свой дорогой сюртук.{/n} "Думаю... Достаточное количество денег способно открыть путь куда угодно".

traits.locale_text: {n}Before replying, the Governor's son nervously adjusts his expensive frock coat.{/n} "I think that... enough money can open up any door."
{n}Before replying, the Governor's son nervously adjusts his expensive frock coat.{/n} "I think that... enough money can open up any door."
{n}Before replying, the Governor's son nervously adjusts his expensive frock coat.{/n} "I think... the right amount of money can open up any door."

{n}Before replying, the governor's son nervously adjusts his expensive frock coat.{/n} "I think... the right amount of money can open any door."
{n}Before replying, the governor's son nervously adjusts his expensive frock coat.{/n} "I think... the right amount of money can open any door."

languages.text: {n}総督の息子は緊張しながら高価なフロックコートを整えて返答する。{/n}「思うに…それなりのお金を積めば、なんでもできるのではないでしょうか」
languages.original_text: {n}Before replying, the governor's son nervously adjusts his expensive frock coat.{/n} "I think... the right amount of money can open any door."

traits.locale_text: {n}総督の息子は緊張しながら高価なフロックコートを整えて返答する。{/n}「思うに…それなりのお金を積めば、なんでもできるのではないでしょうか」

languages.text: {n}回答你的问题之前，总督的儿子紧张地扯了扯身上昂贵的礼服。{/n}“我认为……只要有钱，没有打不通的路。”
languages.original_text: {n}Before replying, the governor's son nervously adjusts his expensive frock coat.{/n} "I think... the right amount of money can open any door."

traits.locale_text: {n}回答你的问题之前，总督的儿子紧张地扯了扯身上昂贵的礼服。{/n}“我认为……只要有钱，没有打不通的路。”

languages.text: {n}Avant de répondre, le fils du gouverneur ajuste nerveusement sa redingote.{/n} « Je pense... qu'une belle somme d'argent peut ouvrir toutes les portes. »
languages.original_text: {n}Before replying, the governor's son nervously adjusts his expensive frock coat.{/n} "I think... the right amount of money can open any door."

traits.locale_text: {n}Avant de répondre, le fils du gouverneur ajuste nerveusement sa redingote.{/n} « Je pense... qu'une belle somme d'argent peut ouvrir toutes les portes. »

languages.text: {n}Antes de responder, el hijo del gobernador se ajusta nervioso su carísima levita.{/n} «Creo... que el dinero es capaz de abrir cualquier puerta».
languages.original_text: {n}Before replying, the governor's son nervously adjusts his expensive frock coat.{/n} "I think... the right amount of money can open any door."

traits.locale_text: {n}Antes de responder, el hijo del gobernador se ajusta nervioso su carísima levita.{/n} «Creo... que el dinero es capaz de abrir cualquier puerta».

languages.text: {n}Bevor der Sohn des Gouverneurs antwortet, zupft er nervös seinen teuren Gehrock zurecht.{/n} "Ich glaube ... mit der richtigen Menge an Gold öffnet sich jede Tür."
languages.original_text: {n}Before replying, the governor's son nervously adjusts his expensive frock coat.{/n} "I think... the right amount of money can open any door."

traits.locale_text: {n}Bevor der Sohn des Gouverneurs antwortet, zupft er nervös seinen teuren Gehrock zurecht.{/n} "Ich glaube ... mit der richtigen Menge an Gold öffnet sich jede Tür."

languages.text: {n}Valinin oğlu cevap vermeden önce fiyakalı frağını düzeltiyor.{/n} "Şöyle ki... yeteri kadar parası olan dilediği kapıyı açabilir."
languages.original_text: {n}Before replying, the governor's son nervously adjusts his expensive frock coat.{/n} "I think... the right amount of money can open any door."
